metadata.title: Propagation analysis and prediction of the COVID-19

abstract.original_text: Based on the official data modeling, this paper studies the transmission process of the Corona Virus Disease 2019 (COVID-19). The error between the model and the official data curve is within 3%. At the same time, it realized forward prediction and backward inference of the epidemic situation, and the relevant analysis help relevant countries to make decisions.

sentences.segment_text: Based on the official data modeling ,
this paper studies the transmission process of the Corona Virus Disease 2019 ( COVID-19 ) .
The error between the model and the official data curve is within 3 % .
At the same time , it realized forward prediction and backward inference of the epidemic situation ,
and the relevant analysis help relevant countries to make decisions .
